LEGAL CASE STUDY: BEWARE OF SHIFTING MISCLASSIFICATION LAWS
The standards for determining whether an individual is an Employee or an Independent Contractor differ between Federal agencies and also in numerous states pursuant to their laws. TOOLS What do you need to know when engaging a new contractor? We’ll show you.
